name: Physiologyandbehaviorbriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Two-minute daily briefings on the latest research exploring the role of physiology on behavior, with a strong focus on hormones. These briefings are brought you by Dr. Dan Quintana, who is a Senior Researcher in biological psychiatry at the University of Oslo. His research interests include the oxytocin system, heart rate variability, and social behavior. For more on the latest oxytocin, neuroscience, and psychology research, as well as his day-to-day research process, follow Dan on Twitter and Instagram: @dsquintana. 

For episode details, including links to the discussed articles, visit dsquintana.com/show
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
